message:
Session 94-114: Major system improvements

- Added shared utilities module (tools/shared/) with 8 files to reduce code duplication
- Created 14 CLI tools for system management (critique, daily reports, profiler, etc.)
- Built React dashboard (dashboard-ui/) with real-time WebSocket updates
- Added 4 OpenCode skills (orchestrator, memory-manager, multi-agent-patterns, critique-agent)
- Enhanced plugin with tool timing, session tracking, agent coordination
- Migrated 6 CLI tools to shared utilities, removing ~200 lines of duplicate code
- Created comprehensive docs (CODEBASE_ANALYSIS.md, OPENCODE_ARCHITECTURE.md)
- Archived old session docs to docs/archive/
- Quality average: 8.1/10 across 45 assessed tasks

Complete CLI tool migration to shared utilities

Migrated 7 remaining CLI tools to use tools/shared/:
- task-manager.ts (~34 lines)
- daily-report-generator.ts (~49 lines)
- terminal-dashboard.ts (~53 lines)
- agent-performance-profiler.ts (~48 lines)
- git-integration.ts (~21 lines)
- message-bus-manager.ts (~27 lines)
- working-memory-manager.ts (~7 lines)

Total: ~239 lines of duplicate code removed.
Quality: 8.9/10
